category: Personnel, management and administration procedures; Operations and service delivery; Hardware, software or communications equipment and facilities
name: Unidentified information change
description: Repository is incapable of tracking or monitoring where one or more changes to archived information has taken place.
notes:
- Are repository mechanisms available to identify where preserved information has been subject to interactions or change? 

The full description of this risk has been obtained from examples provided in DRAMBORA - Digital Repository Audit Method Based on Risk Assessment, March 2007, Digital Curation Centre (DCC) and Digital Preservation Europe (DPE), http://www.repositoryaudit.eu/
preMitigationNotes: - Repository has failed to record or maintain adequate checksum information to detect where changes have been made to archived information
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Implement policies and procedures to record, calculate and compare checksum values for archived information on a regular basis In the event of riskâ€™s execution:
- Implement policies and procedures to record, calculate and compare checksum values for archived information on a regular basis
- Invoke treatment strategies to alleviate loss of reputation or trust
